name: Safari Web Bookmark File
summary: Learn about .WEBBOOKMARK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Safari users can use the browser's Bookmarks feature to save and organize links to their favorite or important webpages. These links are saved in WEBBOOKMARK files. Users can view and organize their bookmarks by selecting Bookmarks → Show Bookmarks in Safari.
Safari saves WEBBOOKMARK files in the following directory by default:

description: A WEBBOOKMARK file is a bookmarks file saved with Apple’s Safari web browser on macOS. It contains informaiton about the webpage that user has saved from the browser. Information stored in a WEBBOOKMARK file includes the page title, URL, and the bookmark group to which this page is stored. When a webpage is bookmarked, Safari browser asks the group for storing the bookmarked page. Most users save the bookmarks in Bookmarks folder which is the default location offered by common browsers.

A WEBBOOKMARK file is a bookmark file created by Safari, macOS's default web browser. It contains information about a bookmarked webpage, including the page's title, URL, and bookmark group. WEBBOOKMARK files are used to save and organize a user's bookmarks.
